entry.title: Dead Ends and New Beginnings
entry.summary:
Author: Buttercupcheese

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,714Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 5

Summary: Stiles groaned and slowly got up. Isaac had fallen asleep somewhere between Peter’s rant about trolls' healing properties and Derek's hypothesis of witches, which — for the first time— well, not first, but Stiles wanted to exaggerate — Stiles thought the same.“Look, I'm running on just, like, three full hours of sleep. I haven't had a single drop of caffeine in my system, and my waffles are getting cold,” he said, heading to reheat his coffee.“You shouldn't drink caffeine, Stiles,” his dad said, concern and disapproval firmly set on his features.“And there shouldn’t be walking corpses out there, Dad, but hey—life’s unfair.”
